cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY, cs.CR, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the problem of fair classification, which is a topic that falls under the broad area of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of a metric to measure similarity between individuals suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the subfield of computational geometry (cs.CG). The paper also discusses the use of a panel of specialists to answer queries about the metric, which could be seen as a form of crowdsourcing, making the paper relevant to the subfield of human computation (cs.CY). Finally, the paper deals with issues of fairness and discrimination, which could be relevant to the subfield of security and privacy (cs.CR) or social and information networks (cs.SI).
